title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to undermine Gotham City's order and force Batman to confront his own limits.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: Interwoven stories of crime, redemption and dark humor follow mobsters, boxers and small-time criminals in Los Angeles.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man with a kind heart and simple outlook.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers the nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers, leading to a fight for humanity's freedom.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more anarchic.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A young hobbit, Frodo, is tasked with destroying a powerful ring while forming an unlikely fellowship to protect his world from darkness.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth grows uninhabitable.

title: The Social Network
overview: The story of the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed, exploring ambition, friendship, and betrayal.

title: Gladiator
overview: A Roman general seeks vengeance against a corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery as a gladiator.

title: The Prestige
overview: Rival magicians engage in a bitter battle of one-upmanship with tragic consequences as they pursue the ultimate illusion.

title: Whiplash
overview: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where an abusive instructor pushes him to the limits to achieve greatness.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: The adventures of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a lobby boy who becomes his trusted ally.

title: The Lion King
overview: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Following the Normandy landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned cannibal to catch another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Memento
overview: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes and tattoos to remember facts.

title: Back to the Future
overview: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by a mad scientist.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
overview: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Spirited Away
overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, a failed comedian becomes a criminal mastermind and symbol of revolution after a series of personal setbacks.

title: La La Land
overview: A musician and an aspiring actress meet and fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee a tyrant and help a group of women escape captivity.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, charting his rise and fall as a stockbroker involved in corruption and fraud.

title: Django Unchained
overview: With the help of a bounty-hunting German, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: The Green Mile
overview: A death row corrections officer discovers a condemned prisoner has a mysterious gift that may change lives.

title: A Beautiful Mind
overview: After receiving a Ph.D. in economics, a brilliant but asocial mathematician develops paranoid schizophrenia and endures delusional episodes while reluctantly watching his life unravel.

title: The Truman Show
overview: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show broadcast to the world.

title: The Pianist
overview: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Blade Runner 2049
overview: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

title: Coco
overview: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to seek his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: The Intouchables
overview: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Amélie
overview: Amélie, a shy waitress in Paris, decides to help those around her and finds love along the way.

title: 12 Angry Men
overview: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as clear-cut as it seemed.

title: Apocalypse Now
overview: A U.S. Army officer is sent on a mission to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

title: The Shining
overview: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and future.

title: Alien
overview: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: WALL·E
overview: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: Up
overview: 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his dream to see the wilds of South America and discovers unexpected friendship.

title: The Revenant
overview: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Black Panther
overview: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king but finds his sovereignty challenged.

title: Arrival
overview: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Skyfall
overview: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her and MI6 comes under attack.

title: The Big Lebowski
overview: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski seeks restitution for his ruined rug and gets embroiled in a complex kidnapping case.

title: Moonlight
overview: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

title: Her
overview: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Inside Out
overview: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions try to help her adjust to a new city and school.

title: The Thing
overview: A group of researchers in Antarctica are hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: No Country for Old Men
overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

title: Heat
overview: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: The Hunt
overview: A man's life unravels when false accusations of child abuse put him at the center of a community's suspicion.

title: Oldboy
overview: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-su is released and must find his captor in five days.

title: City of God
overview: The story of two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro and their divergent paths in life.

title: Trainspotting
overview: Renton and his friends navigate life and heroin addiction in Edinburgh while dreaming of a better future.

title: The Sixth Sense
overview: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist to find peace.

title: Room
overview: Held captive for years, a woman and her young son finally escape and must adjust to a reality neither have experienced.

title: Spotlight
overview: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese.
